Item.Name: SyntaxParsing
Item.Caption: Syntax parsing
Item.Description: The demo shows how to apply different syntax schemes to highlight edit control's content.
Item.Note: Editor.NET is designed to highlight syntax for virtually unlimited set of programming languages. Editor.NET is supplied with more than 20 ready-to-use syntax schemes for the most commonly used modern programming languages, including C, C#, Delphi, Xml, Html, Perl, etc. and has an ability to develop own syntax schemes.
